data.text:
@drkeithsiau @KewinSiah @unimalaya @JGH_latest @DrCalvinKoh @AndrewOngML @john_damianosMD @IBS_Maastricht @NUSMedicine @RomeGastroPsych @JohannahRuddy The brain fog that sets in also blocks some of the DGBI leading to gut fog which fogs up the symptoms…

No I’m kidding….

@KewinSiah @unimalaya @JGH_latest @DrCalvinKoh @AndrewOngML @john_damianosMD @IBS_Maastricht @NUSMedicine @RomeGastroPsych @JohannahRuddy @RashidLui Are there treatments that are more effective for this condition?

@KewinSiah @unimalaya @JGH_latest @DrCalvinKoh @AndrewOngML @drkeithsiau @john_damianosMD @IBS_Maastricht @NUSMedicine @RomeGastroPsych @JohannahRuddy @RashidLui Great work done. @helpatologist Post Covid IBS work being published. 👍

@KewinSiah @JGH_latest @DrCalvinKoh @AndrewOngML @drkeithsiau @john_damianosMD @IBS_Maastricht @NUSMedicine @RomeGastroPsych @JohannahRuddy @RashidLui Is there a need to distinguish between Long Covid and post Covid functional GI disorder? Is there a possibility for overlap? #GITwitter

Commented on 
https://t.co/I96YtnrsSJ
By Prof Uday Ghoshal et al
9% of 288 dvl post-COVID FGIDs @ 6 months
~5.3% #IBS
~2.1% Dyspepsia
~1.8%  IBS/dyspepsia overlap 

Risk factors  
Symptoms: GI, anosmia, ageusia
Early GI symptoms
Psychological comorbidity.

#DGBI #FGID #COVID https://t.co/vs86xgAFOR
